info.title: Film Manager
info.description: REST API for the film Manager

tags.name: films/private
tags.description: the set of all the films of a logged in user

tags.name: films/private/{filmId}
tags.description: one specific film of the list

tags.name: films/public
tags.description: the set of all the public films

tags.name: films/public/invited
tags.description: the set of public film that the user is invited to review

tags.name: films/public/{filmId}/reviews
tags.description: The reviews of a public film

tags.name: films/public/{filmId}/reviews/{reviewId}
tags.description: A specific review of a public film

tags.name: films/public/assignment
tags.description: the assignment of the review to the users

tags.name: users
tags.description: the set of all the users

film.description: A Json schema for the film in the film library

owner.description: The id of the owner in the library of the film

private.description: A boolean field that indicate if other users can see the film in the library

watchDate.description: The date when whatched the film

favorite.description: A boolean filed that indicate if the film is fav or not

review.description: A Json schema for the film review

completed.description: A boolean field that mark if the review is complete

reviewDate.description: The date when the review as been completed

user.description: A Json schema for the user

post.summary: Log the user in or out
post.description: The user send username and password to log in

schema.description: type of operation if login or logout

requestBody.description: The data sent to perform the login

get.description: Get a list of the film of a user logged in

schema.description: The id of the reqested page

get.description: The private film with ID filmId is retrieved. This operation can be performed on the film if the user who performs the operation is the film's owner.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film to retrieve

put.description: The private film with ID filmId is updated. This operation does not allow changing its visibility. This operation can be performed only by the owner.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film to update

requestBody.description: The updated film object that needs to replace the old object

409.description: Conflict (attempt to make unallowed change, e.g., visibility)

delete.description: The private film with ID filmId is deleted. This operation can only be performed by the owner.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film to delete

get.description: The public films (i.e., the films that are visible for all the users of the service) are retrieved. This operation does not require authentication. A pagination mechanism is implemented to limit the size of messages.

parameters.name: pageNo
parameters.description: The id of the requested page (if absent, the first page is returned)

get.summary: Retrieve the public films that the logged-in user has been invited to review
get.description: The public films that the logged-in user has been invited to review are retrieved. A pagination mechanism is implemented to limit the size of messages.

parameters.name: pageNo
parameters.description: The id of the requested page (if absent, the first page is returned)

get.description: The public film with ID filmId is retrieved. This operation does not require authentication.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film to retrieve

put.description: The public film with ID filmId is updated. This operation does not allow changing its visibility. This operation can be performed only by the owner.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film to update

requestBody.description: The updated film object that needs to replace the old object

409.description: Conflict (attempt to make unallowed change, e.g., visibility)

delete.description: The public film with ID filmId is deleted. This operation can only be performed by the owner.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film to delete

post.summary: Issue film reviewr to some users
post.description: The film with ID filmId is assigned to one or more users for review and the corresponding reviews are created. The users are specified in the review representations in the request body. This operation can only be performed by the owner.

requestBody.description: the new film reviews, including the users to whom they are issued

409.description: Conflict (e.g., wrong film id or unknown reviewer id)

get.summary: Retrieve the list of all the reviews that have been issued/completed for a film
get.description: All the reviews that have been issued/completed for the film with ID filmId are retrieved. A pagination mechanism is implemented to limit the size of messages. This operation does not require authentication.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film whose reviews must be retrieved

parameters.name: pageNo
parameters.description: ID of the requested page (if absent, the first page is returned)'

get.summary: Retrieve a review that has been issued/completed for a film
get.description: The review of the film with ID filmID issued to the user with ID reviewerId is retrieved. This operation does not require authentication.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film whose reviews must be retrieved

parameters.name: reviewerId
parameters.description: ID of the user to whom the review has been issued

put.description: The review of the film with ID filmId and issued to the user with ID reviewerId is completed. This operation only allows setting the "completed" property to the "true" value, and changing the values of the "reviewDate", "rating", and "review" properties. This operation can be performed only by the invited reviewer.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film whose review must be completed

parameters.name: reviewerId
parameters.description: ID of the user to whom the review has been issued

requestBody.description: The properties of the Review object that must be updated

reviewDate.description: the date when the review has been completed by the invited user

rating.description: the rating the reviewer has given to the film

review.description: a textual description of the review

delete.description: The review of the film with ID filmId and issued to the user with ID reviewerId is deleted. This operation can only be performed by the owner, and only if the review has not yet been completed by the reviewer.

parameters.name: filmId
parameters.description: ID of the film whose review invitation must be deleted

parameters.name: reviewerId
parameters.description: ID of the user to whom the review has been issued

post.summary: Assign automatically review invitations for the unassigned public films owned by the authenticated user in a balanced manner
post.description: The films owned by the authenticated user who performed the request and that are not assigned to any user for review, are automatically assigned to the users of the service in a balanced manner. Only authenticated users can make this request.
